channel.title: Server status page problem
channel.description: ok my server has been running all night and idk what time ive started it yesterday so if its been running for 24 hours doesnt it add it to the server status list automatically??? if so, what will the name ip etc be listed as? dont i have to do it or does it not show up and i have to list it? how do i know if its online thanks

item.title: Server status page problem
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

Omg You use “Moparscape server status page” If you do there are a column With “Server name” There Put YOur ServerName. Then there are one with “Server Ip” Put your ip there. And One With “Port” Put “5555” if you have that port or “43594” If you have that port.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page problem
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Name it as your server name, and it has to be on for straight 24 hours for a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page problem
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

how do i name it as that? i didnt get to name it all i got to do was make the ip login with 127.0.0.1 and stuff… will i have to leave it on for 24 hours every day i shut it down and then up ?

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page problem
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Say you picked a name of; “NoobScape 377,” it would appear like that, maybe you did add it, but it had some downtime and isn’t listed at the top, have a look through the status page.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page problem
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

If your server has been offline for a majority of the time it will not add.

Read full topic
